roleset.name: striking, knocking, tapping

role.descr: Instrument, thing percussed by or with

example.name: percuss-v
example.text: If the healthy lungs be percussed *, the sound elicited is sonorous and clear;

example.name: percussion-n
example.text: The purpose of both palpation and percussion of the spleen is to look for splenic enlargement.

roleset.note: PERCUSSION-N NOTES: Comparison to verb-strike.01. (from percussion.01-n)
